column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello B. C. - Thanks for your review. Please know if you ever receive a bowl that does not meet your satisfaction 100%
column2: inform your server and he or she will have the chefs remake the bowl
column3: or your server will suggest something else. Or take it off your tab if there's nothing else you'd like to try. Thank you again
column4: and we do hope you'll visit us again soon.
